titleStmt.title: Catalogue de la Deuxième exposition d'art photographique du Photo-Club de Paris

bibl.title: Exposition d'art photographique, deuxième année, 1895 : catalogue
bibl.author: Photo-Club de Paris
bibl.extent: 47 pages, [2] leaves of plates : illustrations ; 26 cm

surrogates.name: Metropolitan Museum of Art (New York, N.Y.)

event.head: Deuxième exposition d'art photographique du Photo-Club de Paris
Photo-Club de Paris

samplingDecl.p: This electronic version of the catalog only reproduces the entries that correspond to exhibited works. All text preceding or succeeding the list of documents is not reproduced below.
